snippet.title: Super Russian Roulette - A New Party Game for the NES
snippet.description:
GET A COPY HERE :  http://www.superrussianroulette.com

Pull up a chair and rustle up some virtual nihilism, pardner. Super Russian Roulette pits you and up to two friends or strangers against a trash-talking cowboy, impatient to get on with the ultimate game of chance. There’s a light bullet in the Zapper’s chamber: is your name on it? (To increase actual dread, add penalty shots of bottom-shelf hooch for the losers.) Keep spinning the barrel till only one player remains.


SUPER RUSSIAN ROULETTE

Director: Ray Zablocki
Producer: Robyn Nielsen
Director of Photography: Norm Magnuson
Assistant Camera: DJ Carroll
Gaffer: Justin Frabasile
Grip/BTS: Phil Maniaci 
Production Design: Cale Hughes
Original Music: Nick Gargiulo
Sound Design & Mix: Joseph Kelly
Visual Effects Supervisor: Hugo Marmugi
Production Assistants: John Wisneski, Michael Dooley
Additional Music Mixing: Joseph Maniscalco

CAST
Voice Over: Paul Guyet
Nihilism Guy: Brett Glass
Pizza Girl: Tessa Greenberg
Funny Muffin: Jarrod Zayas
The Cowboy: Rob Kurtz
Teddy: Teddy
Special Thanks:
Thibaut Estellon and LightHouse Films
http://LHFNY.com/
